short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortless Instagram comment extractor extension, with nested replies export feature for user convenience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Works on:
- Any User's post
- Any Page's post

With ‚ù§Ô∏è from esuit.dev

Introducing our Instagram Comment Exporter, a browser extension that seamlessly extracts comments, including nested replies, and imports directly to Google Sheets or downloads as CSV/JSON. User-friendly and efficient for data handling.

Facebook version
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/esuit-comments-exporter-f/flhbkccofabjoiphncbedainkoipgggf

SEO Keywords: Instagram comments, export tool, browser extension, nested replies, Google Sheets integration, CSV download, JSON format, efficient data management, social media analytics.



Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Find more extensions: This is a promotional link if you want to discover more browser extensions developed by ESUIT.
Buy me a coffee: If you'd like to support our future updates and maintenance, you can use this feature to buy us a cup of coffee.
Report a bug: If you encounter any issues, you can get in touch with us through this link, and we will assist you in fixing it.
Rate Chrome Store options: If you enjoy using this extension, you can click here to rate it.

Privacy Policy
If you log in to this extension using Google Gmail, we will store your email address for the purpose of distinguishing between subscribed and non-subscribed users.(If you are a non-subscribed user, we will not collect any of your information.)
Read more https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

How to Download Facebook Photos in bulk? (2023)
How to Save Pictures from Facebook?
Before you delete all the photos from Facebook and lose them forever, downloading them first might be a great idea. That way, they will all be in the same folder.

How to Download Facebook Photos in bulk? (2023)
How to Save Pictures from Facebook?
Before you delete all the photos from Facebook and lose them forever, downloading them first might be a great idea. That way, they will all be in the same folder.
